data.text: @LawyersAnd @BarbaraRich_law @katiegollop We use @LPQUK St Paul’s for our regular @WomenInTax breakfast meetings. Large table down the middle is ideal; flexible staff; reasonably-priced food AND they automatically split the bill.
@katiegollop @LawyersAnd That’s a really good idea - I also use Taylor Street coffee just off Chancery Lane as an extension of my workplace - it’s got quite spacious seating inside and out
@LawyersAnd Have you thought about using one of the Inns of Court? All of them have really nice places to sit, have tea/coffee and chat.
@LawyersAnd Not been there but @benkandbo looks interesting.  Ideas @ldncoffeeshops ?
